snippet: The Swiss National Bank sees increasing political risks around the world but has the tools it needs to deal with their potential impact on the "significantly overvalued" Swiss franc, Chairman Thomas Jordan told newspaper Schweiz am Wochenende....

headline.main: Women’s Fashion Shows: Rick Owens, Chloé, Balmain

lead_paragraph: The Swiss National Bank sees increasing political risks around the world but has the tools it needs to deal with their potential impact on the "significantly overvalued" Swiss franc, Chairman Thomas Jordan told newspaper Schweiz am Wochenende.
